title: France panorama. [No. 67/18]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The Cannes Festival - opening of the Cannes Film Festival showing glimpses of celebrities including Gina Lollobrigida, Annie Girardot, Yves Montand, Geraldine Chaplin, Claude Lelouch. 2. Art in the raw and therapy art: An exhibition at the Musee des Art Decoraties of “L’Art Brut”. St Anne’s Hospital for the mentally ill has introduced art sessions for its patients. 3. Chantiers Sous-Marins - focuses on the training of professional skin-divers. 4. A stroll in the past - presents one of Paris’ 60 villages. 5. France’s most spectacular historical gardens.
